text:
Company Background:
Jackson-Riley is a leading academic publishing house dedicated to advancing knowledge across various disciplines. We pride ourselves on maintaining high standards and fostering a collaborative work environment.

Job Type:
Internship

Job Description:
We are looking for a dynamic and motivated Book Search and Scholar Intern to join our team. The intern will assist in identifying and curating scholarly texts, aiding in research, and supporting our editorial staff.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct thorough searches for academic publications and books.
- Assist in the evaluation and selection of scholarly texts.
- Support editorial staff with research and data analysis.
- Maintain accurate records of searches and findings.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Must be familiar with workplace customs.
- Must have near-native proficiency in Spanish.
- Looking for individuals who have native proficiency in Dutch.
- Seeking candidates who share our team’s values.
- Strong research and analytical skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Opportunities to work with renowned scholars and editors.
- Access to a vast library of academic resources.
- Flexible working hours and remote working options.
- Professional development opportunities.

Jackson-Riley is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
